page.title: 03Employment and Population
page.content: The{population}of Ravensworth is{250.} The{percentage}of people who{have {jobs,}men{78.6%,}women{18.5%.}Jobs are provided for local people as follows:- {Garden Centre}6 family members, 4 females 1 male and many part time helpers.{Forge}2 family members,1 male (mainly agricultural engineering).{Bay {Horse Inn}4 family members and 7 part timers.{School}1 teacher, 1 caretaker and 2 dinner ladies.{Mr Gregory}self employed agricultural machinery repairer.{Mr Bulmer}motor repairer self employed.{Shop}self employed owner 1 lady. There are{5 farms}which employ only family members. Several ladies in the village do{domestic work for houses in the village.{Caravan {site}owner and wife.There are{several {more self employed}people but about{50 {leave}to work in{nearby quarries and {towns}e.g. Darlington,Richmond etc.
